name: Bad Job Corporation (English Version)
description:
Welcome to Bad Job Corporation!

We have a  bureaucrat post for you! But we have a rigorous system for our employees:

  • Our boss does not like to see employees doing nothing
  • You should be kind with your coworkers and do not distract too much with your job
  • People frequently visit your office

How much score can you acumulate before being fired? Only a way to know!

Versión en Español: https://asdonaurdev.itch.io/bad-job-corporation-enespanol
